const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "thai_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      filter: {
        thai_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_thai_",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_thai: {
          tokenizer: "thai",
          filter: ["lowercase", "decimal_digit", "thai_stop"],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
